title: Differential Equations
text:
Preface
This book is a study work to Differential Equations General Exam. Principally based in Perko (1996).
This book contains the sufficient theory to solve the Book Excersices of the Chapters 1, 2 and 4.




Perko, Lawrence. 1996. Differential Equations and Dynamical Systems. Second. Vol. 7. Texts in Applied Mathematics. Springer-Verlag, New York. https://doi.org/10.1007/978-1-4684-0249-0.

title: 2  Summary
text: In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.
